hooks.prompt: Evaluate if this session involved WezTerm configuration work (editing .wezterm.lua, troubleshooting WezTerm issues, or discussing WezTerm configuration). If YES: ask the user if there are learnings to capture, and if they provide any, append to ${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/.cache/learnings.md Learnings section with date prefix [YYYY-MM-DD] under categories 'Successful Patterns' or 'Mistakes to Avoid', then return {"ok": true}. If NO WezTerm work was done: return ONLY {"ok": true} with no other text.
